Danny Green大膽道出Kawhi Leonard和LeBron James的最大分別

Danny Green告訴《每日星報》的Mark Taylor說：「他不僅是一名出色的球員和出色的得分手，而且他能使他的隊友變得更好。他是一位偉大的組織者，他是一位偉大的隊友，他是一位偉大的領袖。在場上場外，沒有人能比他更好，而且已經有一段時間，他所做的令人難以置信。」

Danny Green甚至繼續說「LeBron James是比前隊友總決賽MVP Kawhi Leonard更好的球員。」

他解釋說：「Kawhi令人難以置信的天賦是來自防守，時至今天發展成多樣得分手。可是他的膝蓋仍帶傷，因此我們不知道他要花多長時間才可以痊癒。他也很棒。他仍在學習如何成為一名出色的領導者，到目前為止，他在球隊的表現還不錯。可是對我來說，LeBron是最好的球員。」

這個球館風水有問題？球隊顧問Pachulia請大師在勇士新球館作法祈福！

11月25日 前勇士球員、現擔任球隊顧問的Zaza Pachulia，在本週邀請了兩位大師來到勇士新主場大通中心作法，對球館進行祝福。

勇士從本賽季開始搬至新主場大通中心，但新球館似乎並沒有給球隊帶來好運，球隊在賽季開始後傷病不斷，Curry、Russell、格林等主將均受到不同程度的傷病問題，球隊目前的戰績僅為3勝14負，排名聯盟墊底。

對於這樣的情況，球迷們調侃道“新球館風水不好”，不知道是不是受到了啟發，Pachulia請了大師來對球館進行祝福。

大通中心官方曬出了這段作法的影片，兩位大師在Pachulia的陪同下，在球館進行了祝福儀式，包括祈福、灑聖水等儀式。

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rZtIKj8fxIo&feature=emb_title

【傳聞】最近爆出國王上年沒選上Luka Doncic的荒謬原因

國王的經理Vlade Divac，與歐洲聯盟有著良好的聯繫，並且已經曾見過Doncic，知道他的實力。根據ESPN的Tim MacMahon在The Woj Pod的報導，大概是有段故事才沒有選上他的。

他認為Luka Doncic與Vlade Divac的確是關係相當緊密，Divac甚至熟識他的父親，但Divac並不喜歡他的父親，這是國王最終不選Luka Doncic的原因。但MacMahon補充道，他認為Vlade Divac其實並不了解Luka Doncic的父親，並認為Vlade Divac在選秀會上搞砸了。

I'm a fan of Vince Carter. He was certainly an exciting slam dunker who was worth his weight in gold to Raptors. Don't get me wrong- I still enjoy watching him play even though his prime has passed. He proved his worth to Raptors by helping win multiple championships. His worth to the team was incalculable. I must say he's made dramatic progress with his three point shooting since he joined nets. Unfortunately his leg progress has progressed fairly quickly in the last four weeks causing him to be sidelined for six months with a bad leg injury. He complained that taking a six-month hiatus was too long but it's for his own good. He has a follow-up to the doctor next week. His friend LeBron James will also be out of commission until his back heals. He's made little progress with his shooting since he injured his back. His doctor said he was making good progress and will check on his progress next month. He assigned the blame for his injury to a lack of training and stretching. Oh well it could be worse. His worth of contribution to Lakers is incalculable. Lakers is as likely to win the finals next year as Warriors in my opinion. The other week Lakers didn't just beat Suns. They wiped the floor with Suns. Everybody was on the edge of their seats. LeBron yelled at Suns "Boo!" as Lakers won. Suns has lots its edge to some extent since its point leaders left the team. Recently Bulls edged out Suns by two points which reminded me of Warriors edging out Cavaliers by three points. The responsibilities of every coach in every team are well defined. Everyone has a vital role to play in every team. In addition the government has set up a commission to examine the use of steroids among players. Another commission has also been established to investigate family violence in NBA which I wholeheartedly support. My friend Alan got a front row ticket for the All-Star game which was very hard to buy. I said "Fair enough. It's difficult to get a front row ticket but you should ask your boss if you could take a few days off beforehand as you'll need to fly to America for it" He was too excited lol. Yesterday I had my personal training session in the gym and was soaking wet then I soaked in a jacuzzi. The gym is situated beside the jacuzzi where you can see the inside of the gym clearly. I saw a slim guy lift a light four pound dumbell for all he was worth but still couldn't complete the exercise. I enjoy hitting the gym and I know my personal trainer is worth her salt as I'm making good progress with my physique. She's a vivacious in-your-face woman who's sometimes too honest for her own good. I dislike working out in Physical Fitness because the salespeople there are way too in-your-face.

【大改革？】NBA正討論把例行賽減至78場，季後賽形式改變，與新增季中錦標賽的可能

根據外國知名記者WOJ消息指，NBA官方正提出一系列的變革：

據報導指，NBA正打算把例行賽季由以往的82場，縮減至最少安排78場賽事，而部分球隊可能出現79場賽事，最多83場賽事的情況，視乎分區與情況而定；另外，NBA還提出了季後賽形式的變革，在季後賽出現最後四強時，會根據戰績重新進行對決排序。因此，總決賽最終可能出現東岸對東岸，或西岸對西岸的賽事，顛峰以往東西岸爭冠的情況。

進入季後賽的資格，目前也正在探討改變的可能。報導指出，有可能會由以往東西兩岸最好成績的八支球隊，改為先由東西兩岸的前六強入圍，再由分岸的第七至第八名，與第九至第十名分別進行比賽，從而爭奪最終第七，第八種子的位置，以進入季後賽，吸引更多觀眾。這也是上述為什麼提到，例行賽有可能出現83場賽事的原因。

此外，改革中還提出了增加季中錦標賽，三十支球隊都會參與。季中錦標賽為例行賽的一部分，由各分區打起，最後由六支分區成績最好(包括主場與客場賽事)，與兩支剩下最好戰績的球隊，以淘汰賽的方式進行。

而整系列的變革建議，如果得到Adam Silver與NBPA(美國國家籃球協會球員工會)的贊成，建議將會於明年4月進行正式投票。若然通過，將最快於2021 – 2022賽季實施。

replies.msg: 好撚傳神
MELO感動世人

老瓜Carmelo Anthony轟全場最高２５分，這個瓜整體狀態一場比一場還甜中。

扮演讓兒子驕傲的父親

-

🎥Melo轟全場最高２５分Highlights⬇﻿
■https://twitter.com/HBKMAMBA/status/1199172635998818305

希望大家能支持我的twitter，這賽季Highlights都剪在這～﻿
🌐我的twitter➡ https://twitter.com/HBKMAMBA﻿

-

努力保持下去，好好證明自己吧！Melo～

自從Melo復出後，現在拓荒者比賽變成我必看的賽事，甚至會暫時放掉湖人的場次，畢竟現在湖人已經找到勝利方程式，現在就是如何求穩求進步，像最近防守端有點鬆懈，雖然七連勝，但有些贏球過程倒是沒讓人看了滿意...

-

倒是Carmelo Anthony，復出每場看下來，他的狀態真的越來越好，上一場要不是三分手感太差，其實他應該有機會寫下還不差的數據表現。

一些在肘區或弱側的單打，或是無球跑動創造的機會都有出來，就是看他能不能把投籃準心調整到更穩。

-

而今天打芝加哥公牛，Carmelo Anthony打出一場典型波特蘭拓荒者期盼他的優質表現內容。

不斷積極幫忙隊友場拆，四處遊走，不停在弱側埋伏拉開進攻空間，且這一戰Melo更是在導傳上帶來貢獻，透過吸引防守去替隊友創造二次助攻機會。

就連在防守端上，Melo只要不要遇到運動力太變態的四號位，他都還是可以去防，像今晚他就把Lauri Markkanen守得不差，要挑剔的話，就是Melo太常去協防，有時會漏掉弱邊的球員，團隊防守上沒有溝通的很好，但至少看得出Melo有很積極不想成為防守累贅。

-

今晚Melo在進攻端打出他正常的手感，全場用50%的命中率拿下場上最高的25分，外帶8籃板2助攻1抄截，三分今晚也擺脫寒冬，來到57.5%的命中率。

在進攻端上，200多萬的他已成為Damian Lillard與CJ McCollum這雙槍可信賴的第三號進攻點，能夠無球替他們減少防守壓力，甚至在有些時候，Melo仍有本事用他昔日的單打能力吃掉對手。

像今晚就上演一記雙手暴扣，讓全場球迷都鼓譟起來，且不得不說，即使已老，大不如從前，但Melo不愧為超級巨星，舉手投足都備受矚目，即便在客場，場邊驚呼聲也不絕於耳，不少球迷都在高喊他的名字。

-

這一場除了Melo值得肯定外，前陣子我都看不下去的Hassan Whiteside，此戰確實就打出一場好球，不僅是數據好看，這一戰的拚勁與專注力明顯就在對的位置上，也讓他成為球隊能贏球的功臣之一。

而Melo其實真的很幸運，來到拓荒者他確實備受信任，看總教練Terry Stotts的調度(此勝也是送Stotts的生日禮物)，還有Lillard在比賽中的過程，都能看出他們相信Melo會越來越好，他現在也正奮力不讓大家失望。

拓荒者這場擊敗公牛，總算中止士氣低迷的四連敗，就看這一場勝利可否讓他們慢慢振作起來，也期盼看到Melo越來越好，他確實還有油能貢獻給球隊，也比不少球員還有能力(拓荒者迷自己應該很清楚)。

-

最後也恭喜Carmelo Anthony。

這一戰拿下25分後，他總得分正式超越Alexander English的25613分，擠進歷史總得分第18名，也是現役總得分第二高的球員，僅次於LeBron James。

假使能持續發揮下去，Melo本季是有機會挑戰進入總得分榜前15名之內，就看他到底能不能證明自己到底，與成功延長自己的職業生涯。

-

這個瓜，我自己相信會越來越甜，在球團、教練與球員都坦承對他、信任他的情況，這位老傳奇是還存有這能耐的。

此戰他與兒子敬禮的話面，正說明他也想做一個讓兒子能驕傲的父親，這個回歸籃壇的機會，他肯定會奮力一搏。

-

就一個細節 球迷估計DeMar Derozan恐被交易

美國《邁阿密先驅報》記者Barry Jackson透露馬刺有可能會把Derozan和LaMarcus Aldridge一同交易至熱火，以換來一些潛力新人。Barry Jackson表示熱火總裁Pat Riley曾公開表達過自己十分欣賞DeMar Derozan和LaMarcus Aldridge二人。而熱火隊擁有很多新秀球員，絕對適合作為交易至馬刺這支很會培育球員的球隊的籌碼。他們二人的合約將在明年到期，所以也不會影響熱火未來薪資。

另外有眼利球迷發現DeMar Derozan稍早已經將他個人Instagram上的內容全部刪除，上一次做這個動作的時候是得知自己要被速龍交易的時候。

刺又比人炒緊

I'm a fan of vince Carter. He was a very exciting slam dunker who was worth his weight in gold to Raptors. Don't get me wrong -i still enjoy watching him play even though he's past his prime. He proved his worth to Raptors by helping win multiple championships. His worth to the team was incalculable. I must say he's made significant progress with his three point shooting since he joined Nets. Unfortunately his leg injury has progressed fairly quickly over the last five weeks forcing him to be sidelined for three months because of his injury. He complained that taking a three-month hiatus was too long but it's for his own safety. He has a follow-up to the doctor next month. His friend LeBron James is also gonna be out of commission until his back heals. He's made slow but steady progress with his shooting since he injured his back. His doctor said he was making good progress and will check on his progress next month. He assigned the blame for his injury to a lack of stretching and training. Oh well it could be worse. His worth of contribution to Lakers is incalculable. Lakers is as likely to beat warriors as Cavaliers in my opinion. Recently Lakers didn't just beat Rockets. They wiped the floor with Rockets. LeBron cried to Rockets "in your face!" as Lakers won. Everyone was on the edge of their seats. Rockets has lost its edge to a certain extent since its point leafeds left the team. Just the other week Suns edged out rockets by four points which reminded me of warriors edging out Cavaliers by one point. The role of every coach in every team is clearly defined. Everybody has an important role to play in every team. In addition the government has established a commission to look at the use of steroids among players. Another commission has also been created to examine family violence in nba which I wholeheartedly support. My friend Alex bought a front row ticket for the All-Star game which was very hard to get. I said "fair enough. It's difficult to get a front row ticket but you should've asked your boss if you could get a few days off as you'll need to fly to America for it." He was too excited lol. Yesterday I had my personal training session and my vest was soaking wet then I soaked in a jacuzzi. The gym is situated beside the jacuzzi where you can see the inside of the gym clearly. I saw a slim guy lift a two pound dumbbell for all he was worth but still couldn't complete the exercise lol. I enjoy hitting the gym and I know my personal trainer is worth her salt as I'm making good progress with my physique. She's a vivacious in-your-face woman who's sometimes too honest for her own good. I dislike working out in Physical because the salespeople there are way too in-your-face.

Kobe Bryant's brother is my friend. Last week he was late because he got off at the wrong stop and had to wait for another train. I said "how on earth did you miss your stop?" He said "I'm sorry. What can I say?" I complimented him on his basketball skills. He then said "yes what can I say?" The current situation is very bad. I said "well yes what can I say?" Recently I was shocked when I saw a bus crash on the street. He said "I can imagine" His cousin too said "I'm sure you were"

Kobe Bryant's brother Joe is a gym membership salesman who's sending a follow-up email and making a follow-up call to a customer who's interested in joining the ten year membership. I used to work in a gym and whenever a customer paid a visit to the gym I always followed it up with a call or an email. Some of my colleagues followed it up with a visit to the customer. My friend Tom is interested in joining the gym. He had a meeting yesterday and a follow-up has been scheduled for tomorrow. He's also writing a follow-up to the acclaimed "the invisible man" so he's so busy that he won't have time to pay a follow-up visit to the gym. Therefore I handed tom the membership agreement for Joe and will follow up with him in the next couple days. The membership costs three thousand dollars a month which is well worth it for the whole range of facilities you can use. The membership grants you access to the gym as well as the swimming pool. They sell a tub of whey protein for three hundred and fifty dollars which is worth it as its normally twice as expensive. The cost of a tub of casein protein has edged higher by three dollars whereas that of soy protein has edged down by six dollars. The cost of creatine has edged lower to four hundred dollars while that of nitric oxide has edged up from four sixty to four hundred and eighty five dollars. Last friday Tom complained that he was treated badly at Starbucks. As a results s barista provided a referral to a senior staff member who in turn referred his case to the manager. He'll follow up with the manager on his case to be sure that it'll be dealt with seriously. In addition he's been suffering from a stomachache so I referred him to a gastroenterologist. Recently he posted on an online forum and suggested building an art gallery so as to boost tourism which was supported by many people on the forum. They asked the forum administrator for a referral to a district councilor. They'll follow up with the district councilor on the matter being discussed. I will follow up on the issue too. His suggestion of building an art museum is deemed appropriate. Just the other day Joe and I went to a museum where we looked at every huge nineteenth-century oil painting in minute detail so as not to miss any wonderful things. Yesterday Joe gave a party in a hotel instead of at his place so as not to disturb his neighbours.

replies.msg: Bogdan今年好那勁

25榮real撚到

“這種事情一直都在發生，今晚也展示了體育和娛樂永遠都充滿無知與突兀。這樣的重大演出對於多少人生活的真實世界毫無意義，因為有許多重要的事情正在發生，比如搞清楚生命真諦要比那個破球進筐重要得多，或者學習如何在社會的魚缸中根據你的受歡迎程度取得成長，甚至是學習在家庭中有人過世後如何在不知所措的情況下領導家庭。”

“然而，這種體育娛樂的比賽比他人的心理健康更重要，是嗎？或者是在經歷了那些日常生活問題後還得為了NBA和球迷們表演？一切都是為了那些愛你的球迷和球隊？再想想吧，這不過是一場比賽，然後被渲染成了一場球票購買者和觀眾的盛宴，同時卻破壞了人類之所以為人的真實面目。然後他們會在媒體上大肆宣揚，仿佛在提供什麽寶貴的精神食糧一樣，相信自己的觀點對於那些說話和做事有份量的人產生影響，真是些鏡花水月的大花招！”

“然而我總是那個站出來選擇立場並說真話的人，一個有目的、有精神的人生永遠都比一個體育館或者娛樂場所更重要。這場比賽本不該以戲劇化的形式展現，而是應該展示愛意。對這項藝術的愛，是唯一能夠將純粹的人們留在這個巨大的娛樂馬戲團內的事物。不要迷戀眼前的比賽，那不過是消遣，它永遠無法與生活相提並論。”

quote.msg:
25榮real撚到

“這種事情一直都在發生，今晚也展示了體育和娛樂永遠都充滿無知與突兀。這樣的重大演出對於多少人生活的真實世界毫無意義，因為有許多重要的事情正在發生，比如搞清楚生命真諦要比那個破球進筐重要得多，或者學習如何在社會的魚缸中根據你的受歡迎程度取得成長，甚至是學習在家庭中有人過世後如何在不知所措的情況下領導家庭。”

“然而，這種體育娛樂的比賽比他人的心理健康更重要，是嗎？或者是在經歷了那些日常生活問題後還得為了NBA和球迷們表演？一切都是為了那些愛你的球迷和球隊？再想想吧，這不過是一場比賽，然後被渲染成了一場球票購買者和觀眾的盛宴，同時卻破壞了人類之所以為人的真實面目。然後他們會在媒體上大肆宣揚，仿佛在提供什麽寶貴的精神食糧一樣，相信自己的觀點對於那些說話和做事有份量的人產生影響，真是些鏡花水月的大花招！”

“然而我總是那個站出來選擇立場並說真話的人，一個有目的、有精神的人生永遠都比一個體育館或者娛樂場所更重要。這場比賽本不該以戲劇化的形式展現，而是應該展示愛意。對這項藝術的愛，是唯一能夠將純粹的人們留在這個巨大的娛樂馬戲團內的事物。不要迷戀眼前的比賽，那不過是消遣，它永遠無法與生活相提並論。”

replies.msg: 物質主義同精神主義，牙榮選擇左精神主義。
